metadata.title: CVE-2020-8021 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: a Improper Access Control vulnerability in of Open Build Service allowsremote attackers to read files of an OBS package where thesourceaccess/access is disabled This issue affects: Open Build Serviceversions prior to 2.10.5.

criterions.comment: obs-build package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
